Functions

Zuguang Gu (z.gu@dkfz.de)

2024-07-25

Source: vignettes/functions.Rmd
functions.Rmd

Here lists the major high-level functions implemented in this package.

Make curves

Make general curves:

sfc_hilbert(), sfc_peano(), sfc_meander(), sfc_h().

Make curves in their standard forms:

hilbert_curve(), moore_curve(), beta_omega_curve(), peano_curve(), meander_curve(), h_curve().

Other curves

sfc_3x3_combined(), sfc_3x3_combined(), hilbert_3d().

Expansion rules

Pre-defined expansion rules:

SFC_RULES_HILBERT, SFC_RULES_PEANO, SFC_RULES_MEANDER, SFC_RULES_3x3_COMBINED, SFC_RULES_MEANDER_4x4_1, SFC_RULES_MEANDER_4x4_2.

Draw these rules:

draw_rules_hilbert(), draw_rules_peano(), draw_rules_meander(), draw_rules_3x3_combined(), draw_rules_4x4_meander().

Unit flip

sfc_apply(), unit_orientation(), sfc_flip_unit(),

level1_unit_orientation(), change_level1_unit_orientation().

Coordinates of segments

sfc_segments()

Developed by Zuguang Gu.
